title: Cookie Policy
subtitle: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies to provide and improve our services.

section_1.title: What Are Cookies?
section_1.intro: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website.
section_1.description: These files contain information that helps us recognize your device and remember certain information about your visit.
section_1.purpose: Cookies enable us to provide you with a better user experience by remembering your preferences and improving our service functionality.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for our website to function properly and cannot be disabled:
essential.required: ✓ Always Active - Required for website functionality

analytics.title: Analytics & Performance Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website:
analytics.optional: ○ Optional - Can be disabled in cookie preferences

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization:
functional.optional: ○ Optional - Can be disabled in cookie preferences

marketing.title: Marketing & Advertising Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used for marketing and advertising purposes:
marketing.optional: ○ Optional - Can be disabled in cookie preferences

section_3.title: Third-Party Cookies
section_3.intro: We may allow certain third-party services to place cookies on your device to provide enhanced functionality:

services.title: Third-party services we use include:
services.google_analytics: Google Analytics - for website analytics and insights
services.google_ads: Google Ads - for advertising and conversion tracking
services.intercom: Intercom - for customer support and communication
services.hotjar: Hotjar - for user experience analysis and heatmaps
services.stripe: Stripe - for payment processing and fraud prevention

section_3.disclaimer: These third-party services have their own privacy policies and cookie practices. We recommend reviewing their policies for more information.

section_4.title: Cookie Duration
section_4.intro: Cookies have different lifespans depending on their purpose:

session.title: Session Cookies
session.description: Temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser. Used for essential website functionality.

persistent.title: Persistent Cookies
persistent.description: Cookies that remain on your device for a set period (typically 1-24 months) to remember your preferences.

section_5.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
section_5.intro: You have several options to control and manage cookies:

browser_settings.title: Browser Settings
browser_settings.description: You can control cookies through your browser settings:
browser_settings.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies and other site data
browser_settings.firefox: Firefox: Settings > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browser_settings.safari: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data
browser_settings.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Cookies and site data

our_controls.title: Our Cookie Controls
our_controls.description: You can also manage your cookie preferences using our cookie consent banner that appears when you first visit our site.

section_5.warning: ⚠️ Note: Disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality and your user experience.

section_6.title: Updates to This Cookie Policy
section_6.intro: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws.
section_6.notification: When we make significant changes, we will notify you by updating the 'Last Updated' date and may provide additional notice through our website or email.
